BoulderDash.models

Class DisplayableElementModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • BoulderDash.models.DisplayableElementModel
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoulderModel, BrickWallModel, CursorModel, DiamondModel, DirtModel, DoorModel, EmptyModel, ExpandingWallModel, MagicWallModel, RockfordModel, SteelWallModel

    public abstract class DisplayableElementModel
extends java.lang.Object
    DisplayableElementModel Represents a abstract displayable element
